p: The collected plant materials were washed thoroughly with tap water and shade-dried at ambient temperature. Dried samples were ground to a powder with an electric blender and subjected to Soxhlet extraction using polar solvents (ethanol and methanol). The extracts were evaporated on a rotary evaporator under reduced pressure till a solid mass was obtained. All the extracts were kept in sealed vials, labelled with appropriate code, and transported by airmail from Nepal to the KU Leuven, Belgium, for integrated in vitro screening. The dried extracts were kept at 4Â°C until analysis.
